description: This file is a BitBake recipe (likely a .bb or .inc file) for building and installing Lemon, a parser generator. It specifies source URLs, build and install steps, and metadata about the package.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles lemon.c into lemon.o and links it to create the lemon executable.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the lemon binary, related man page, and lempar.c source to the designated directories.
